latex:
For values of $ x$ less than $ 1$ but greater than $ -4$, the expression\\
\[ \frac{x^2 - 2x + 2}{2x - 2}
\]\\
has:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{no maximum or minimum value}\qquad \\
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{a minimum value of }{+1}\qquad \\
\textbf{(C)}\ \text{a maximum value of }{+1}\qquad \\
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{a minimum value of }{-1}\qquad \\
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{a maximum value of }{-1}$
